phrases: A neutral country of 17 million people.
It is a world of magic.
Magic is bought and sold there every day.
It is an integral part of people's lives.
And there are those who use magic as their occupation.
Those people are referred to as wizards.
The wizards belong to various guilds, and perform jobs on commission.
There are a large number of guilds within the country.
And in a certain city there lies a certain guild.
A guild from which various legends were once born...
Or rather, will continue to be born long into the future...
I will never take the train again...
If the info is correct, salamander should be in this town.
L-Let me rest for a bit...
There is only one magic store in this entire town?
This town lives off the fishing business instead of magic.
Not even a tenth of the people in this town use magic,
so this store specializes in selling to traveling wizards.
I guess this was a total bust, then?
Now, now, do not say that.
I have a lot of new merchandise, you know.
Girls just love this ColorS magic.
You can switch the color of your clothes to whatever you feel like that day!
I am searching for some powerful gate keys.
This is the white puppy, White Doggy!
That one's not powerful at all.
How much might it be again?
Come on, how much is it, really, you wonderful old man you...
So my looks are only worth 1000 jewel?
If that is about all I can realistically get, then...
You said that a famous wizard's come to town?
The one they say can use fire magic you cannot buy in a store?
Damn, I ended up taking the train again.
And you are no good at riding things, Natsu.
Not to mention I am starving...
And we do not have any money.
I doubt a fire dragon would be anyone but Igneel, right?
Talk about somebody, and they show up!
Why is my heart beating this fast?
Hey, what is gotten into me?
Am I this excited because he is a famous wizard?
If I said Salamander, would that ring a bell?
What is wrong with you people?
It is not like he meant any harm by it.
Feel free to show it off to your friends.
I guess we got the wrong person.
Now then, I have some business at the next port, so if you will excuse me...
I am having a party on my ship this evening!
Who the heck was that guy?
I am kind of in the splash zone here...
See, that Salamander guy was using a Charm spell, a type of hypnosis spell.
That kind of magic can make people attracted to you, but its sale was banned years ago.
He would go that far just to be popular?
But thanks to you barging in the Charm was lifted, so this is my way of saying thanks.
I know I do not seem like it, but I am actually a wizard myself!
I have not joined a guild yet, though.
Oh yeah, guilds are places where wizards gather to share information and take on jobs.
You cannot be said to be a full-fledged wizard unless you have joined a guild.
There are guilds all over the world, and it is really difficult to get into the popular ones, see!
The one I want to get into, see, has like a ton of amazing wizards, and...
Oh, what am I to do?
I want to join up, but I bet it is really tough...
I am just blabbing on about the world of wizards and stuff...
This is all gibberish to you, is not it?
But I am totally going to join that guild.
I bet that I could get a bunch of big jobs with them.
It looked like you guys were searching for someone.
I would heard that a salamander had come to this town, so it is good we checked it out.
But I guess it was someone else.
He did not look like a salamander.
They are fire dragons, so I really thought it would be Igneel.
What kind of human looks like a fire dragon?
Even in this world of magic, dragons are extremely rare creatures that are hardly ever seen.
Something like that would not be in the middle of a town!
Anyway, I have to get going, so take your time.
You saved me back there, so we are even now,'kay?
But we were not trying to save you or anything...
Oh my, Fairy Tail's caused trouble again?
The Devon thieves gang wiped out along with 7 residences...
Ooh, a photo spread of Mirajane!
But how exactly does one join Fairy Tail?
I wonder if they have an interview or something.
So you want to join Fairy Tail?
I wanted to invite you personally to the party on my ship.
Your Charm will not work on me!
That magic's weak point is awareness!
It does not work on people who know it is being used!
I realized the moment I saw you that you were a wizard.
As long as you come to the party.
There is no way I would go!
Not to a party thrown by a scumbag like you!
You would go so far as to use a Charm to be popular.
It is part of the ceremony, see.
I just wanted the party to have a celebrity as a host, see...
I cannot believe a famous wizard is such an idiot.
You wanted to join Fairy Tail, yes?
Have not you heard of Fairy Tail's Salamander?
You are one of Fairy Tail's wizards?
If you want to join, I will put a word in with the Guild Master.
The party sounds like it will be wonderful, does not it?
You are easy to figure out, you know that?
Hey, do you really think I can get into Fairy Tail?
But in return, keep quiet about the Charm, okay?
We shall meet again at the party, then!
Until then, I have got to play nice with that dumb oaf!
Is that the ship Salamander's party is at?
Stop getting queasy just from thinking about it.
He is the famous Fairy Tail wizard that came to town!
Let us start off with a toast.
Now, open wide, and savor the fruit flavored gems as they enter your mouth...
I have got to deal with it!
What is the meaning of this?
That is magic to knock people out, Sleep.
I want to join Fairy Tail, but I have no intention of being your woman.
What a handful you are, girly!
We have got ourselves quite a haul this time!
So you are a Celestial Wizard?
This magic can only be used by the contract holders.
In other words, these are useless to me.
What is the matter with this guy?
What a horrible thing to do...
So this is what it means to be a Fairy Tail wizard?
Using magic for evil and tricking people...
That is the worst kind of wizard there is!
As I thought, it is no use...
He said he would help me join Fairy Tail.
Wait, since when did you have wings?
It will be trouble if the council gets wind of this!
I have got to save Natsu and the other girls!
Gate of the water bearer, I open thee!
I am a celestial wizard, see.
I use gate keys to call celestial spirits from an alternate dimension.
Use your power and sweep that ship up onto the shore!
Did you, perhaps, just say tch to me?!
You really should not complain like that.
What an annoying girl you are.
The next time you drop my key, I will kill you.
Do not sweep me away, too!
You think it is normal to sweep me up, too?
I ended up sweeping the ship as well.
Do not call me for a while.
I will be on vacation for a week with my boyfriend.
Maybe I should not have apologized back then?
This cat's so oblivious, I do not even know where to start...
A ship was thrown into the port!
And what is it to you?
Take a good look at this face.
I should have told you sooner, but Natsu is also a wizard.
I am Natsu of Fairy Tail!
And I are not never seen you before!
Natsu is a Fairy Tail wizard?
He is the real deal, Bora-san!
Do not call me by that name!
He was thrown out of the Titan Nose guild some years back.
I do not know whether you are a bad guy or a good guy...
But I are not going to let you get away with pretending to be from Fairy Tail!
And what do you plan to do about it, boy?!
I take no pleasure in defeating big-mouths like you.
Are you really a fire wizard?
I cannot believe how gross this fire tastes!
Fire is not going to work on Natsu.
I have never seen magic like that.
Now that I have eaten, I am all revved up.
I have seen that guy before.
With the pink hair, and the scarf that looks like scales...
It is got to be him!
This is what a real Fairy Tail wizard is!
He eats fire, and punches with fire?
A dragon's lungs to breath flames...
A dragon's scales to dissolve flames...
A dragon's claws to wrap in flames...
It is magic that transforms your own body parts into those of a dragon's.
It was originally magic used to deal with dragons.
I am getting a pretty good meal here!
I am going to smoke you to a smoldering crisp!
Iron Fist of the Fire Dragon!
You do not smoke things using flames...
Is not this going a bit overboard?
Crap, let us get outta here!
Why are you taking me with you?
Well, you wanted to join our guild, right?
To enter a guild, you have first got to take an interview.
First impressions are crucial, after all.
Hmm, maybe that is too stiff.
Next time: Fire Dragon, Monkey, and Bull!
I have got to seem more excited and make a big impression!
